thread.title: Intersection of 9th and Joplin Closure on Monday -
thread.title_full: Intersection of 9th and Joplin Closure on Monday - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: News Release
title: Intersection of 9th and Joplin Closure on Monday -
text:
PITTSBURG, KANSAS - The City of Pittsburg will have the intersection of 9th and Joplin closed down beginning Monday morning, October 19th to make repairs to the intersection. The intersection will remain closed until Tuesday evening, October 20th, 2015 to make said repairs.
We apologize for any inconvenience this closure may cause. If you have any questions concerning this matter, please do not hesitate to contact the Department of Public Utilities at (620) 240-5126.
